definition: Poland/Polish/abbr. for 波蘭|波兰[Bo1 lan2]

sentences.english: However, optical internetworking directly based optical wavelength has its intrinsic defects.
sentences.chinese: 然而，基於光波長通道的直接聯網有它特有的侷限性。

sentences.english: The technology of All Optical Wavelength Converter (AOWC) is one of the key technologies in DWDM system.
sentences.chinese: 全光波長變換技術是DWDM系統中的一項關鍵技術。

sentences.english: It also describes the related optical singal processing and optical wavelength changer technology.
sentences.chinese: 再說明其相關的光信號處理和光波長轉換技術。

sentences.english: Eventually, the electromagnetic photons are shifted to optical wavelengths.
sentences.chinese: 最終，電磁光子轉化成光波長。

sentences.english: All-optical wavelength conversion based on a nonlinear optical loop mirror (NOLM) is a promising method.
sentences.chinese: 非線性光纖環鏡是一種很有前途的全光波長變換裝置。

sentences.english: Fluorescent quantum efficiency has nothing to do with the wavelength of exciting light.
sentences.chinese: 熒光量子效率不隨激發光波長而變化。

sentences.english: That is because the grating constants are magnitude large than the optical wavelength.
sentences.chinese: 這是由於使用的光柵常數與光波長不可比擬。

sentences.english: The system structure and working principle of an all-optical wavelength router were introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了一種全光波長路由器的系統結構和工作原理。

sentences.english: The realization of a kind of all-optical wavelength router that is controlled by electrom was described in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 文章描述了一種電控全光波長路由器的實現。
